title: Blanche et Claire
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Paul Larose and Guy L. Cote
brief_description: Showing the relationship between two women of different ages who share their feelings and dreams, this film causes us to reflect on the right to dream in a world where dreams have no value.
creator_credit_for_label: ONF | NFB, Paul Larose and Guy L. Cote
